marklogic.body: Again, not funny and Off the mark. There is no reason for us to have those defense systems around Russia. First, they won't work. Second, they are just ways for private defense firms to make money. Third, the Cold War is over. There is no reason for these systems except to start another Cold War. Also, they violate many agreements we made that ended the Cold War, so to put them up, as supported by the Bush Administration, shows bad faith.
